name.baseName: Beneficiation of Rare Earth Oxides (REO);Rare Earth Oxides (REO);bastnaesite route;Rare Earth Elements (REE) containing ore
稀土氧化物选矿;稀土氧化物;氟碳铈矿路线;含稀土元素矿石

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described process pertains to the beneficiation of Rare Earth Oxides (REO), specifically using the bastnaesite route for REE containing ore, from Bayan Obo in the Chinese Southern Provinces. This beneficiation process is a critical unit operation in the production of rare earth oxides (Rare Earth Oxides (REO)), which are integral to a wide spectrum of high-tech applications, from permanent magnets used in wind turbines and electric vehicles to catalysts in petroleum refining and additives in high-strength alloys.
所述工艺涉及白云鄂博中国南方省份的稀土氧化物（REO）选矿，具体使用含REE矿石的氟碳铈矿路线。此选矿过程是生产稀土氧化物（REO）的关键单元操作，REO是从用于风力涡轮机和电动汽车的永磁体到石油炼制催化剂以及高强度合金添加剂等广泛高科技应用中不可或缺的。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The study considered 15 different functional units corresponding to different RE metals. The assessment included three main RE production sites in China: REO production in Bayan Obo, Sichuan, and IACs. Primary data were collected for foreground production processes from Chinese and further international scientific literature, industry reports, government and industry surveys. The authors assumed a baseline for aqueous and gaseous emissions using national discharge standards for industry from the Chinese Ministry of

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 白云鄂博, 中国南方省份

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Because no primary mining data from Bayan Obo were available, LCI data in the studies (Sprecher, Arshi, Marx, Bailey (Classen et al., 2007)) are based on different data sources either from iron mining or in Althaus from phosphate rock mining. Main inputs are energy and blasting agent
由于没有白云鄂博的初级采矿数据，研究中的生命周期清单数据（Sprecher、Arshi、Marx、Bailey（Classen 等人，2007 年））基于不同的数据源，要么来自铁矿开采，要么来自 Althaus 的磷矿开采。主要投入是能源和爆破剂
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process pertains to the beneficiation of Rare Earth Oxides (REO), specifically using the bastnaesite route for REE containing ore, from Bayan Obo in the Chinese Southern Provinces. This beneficiation process is a critical unit operation in the production of rare earth oxides (Rare Earth Oxides (REO)), which are integral to a wide spectrum of high-tech applications, from permanent magnets used in wind turbines and electric vehicles to catalysts in petroleum refining and additives in high-strength alloys.
所述工艺涉及白云鄂博中国南方省份的稀土氧化物（REO）选矿，具体使用含REE矿石的氟碳铈矿路线。此选矿过程是生产稀土氧化物（REO）的关键单元操作，REO是从用于风力涡轮机和电动汽车的永磁体到石油炼制催化剂以及高强度合金添加剂等广泛高科技应用中不可或缺的。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Goal of this chapter is to identify the most important differences and uncertainties of crucial parameters in the LCIs and to link those directly to the affected LCIAs. However, comparability of LCIA results shown in Fig. 4 is limited due to different LCIA methods, as already mentioned in the chapter “methods”. All LCIA results are shown in Tables S1 and S3 (Supplementary material). It should also be mentioned that we calculated Althaus' LCIA data, as he provided only the LCI in the ecoinvent database. For this, we rebuilt Althaus' original process “rare earth oxide production from bastnasite” in the GaBi software and evaluated it with two LCIA methods for comparison (Table S1).

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Schreiber, A., Marx, J. & Zapp, P. Life Cycle Assessment studies of rare earths production - Findings from a systematic review. Science of The Total Environment 791, 148257 (2021).
Schreiber, A., Marx, J. & Zapp, P. Life Cycle Assessment studies of rare earths production - Findings from a systematic review. Science of The Total Environment 791, 148257 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the LCI data for this beneficiation process, it is important to note that the data are proxies based on iron mining or phosphate rock mining due to the lack of primary mining data from Bayan Obo. This necessitates caution when interpreting the results and extrapolating these for environmental impact assessments of actual REO production. Users must consider the most important differences and uncertainties of crucial parameters in the LCIs, such as energy consumption and emissions. Additionally, since the comparability of LCIA results may be limited due to different methodologies, users should pay attention to the methods used and acknowledge this when comparing different LCIA outcomes. Users are advised to utilize the supplementary tables (S1 and S3) and consider recalculating LCIA data when original processes are available in databases such as the ecoinvent database using a consistent LCIA method for comparison purposes.

在使用此选矿过程的生命周期清单（LCI）数据时，重要的是要注意由于缺乏来自白云鄂博的初级采矿数据，所以数据是基于铁矿开采或磷矿开采的代理数据。这要求用户在解释结果和外推实际REO生产的环境影响评估时要小心。用户必须考虑LCI中关键参数如能源消耗和排放的最重要的差异和不确定性。另外，由于使用不同的生命周期影响评估（LCIA）方法，LCIA结果的可比性可能有限，用户应注意所使用的方法并在比较不同LCIA结果时acknowledge this when comparing different LCIA outcomes. 用户应当可用附加表（S1和S3）并在数据库如ecoinvent数据库中有原始过程可用时，使用一致的LCIA方法重新计算LCIA数据以进行比较。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
